# NEVPNConnection

**Class**

An object to start and stop a Personal VPN connection and get its status.

## Declaration

```swift
class NEVPNConnection
```

## Overview

[doc://com.apple.networkextension/documentation/NetworkExtension/NEVPNConnection] objects are not instantiated directly. Instead, each `NEVPNManager` object has an associated [doc://com.apple.networkextension/documentation/NetworkExtension/NEVPNConnection] object as a read-only property.

The [doc://com.apple.networkextension/documentation/NetworkExtension/NEVPNConnection] class provides methods for starting and stopping the VPN programmatically. The other way that the VPN can be started and stopped is through VPN On Demand. See the `onDemandRules` property in [doc://com.apple.networkextension/documentation/NetworkExtension/NEVPNManager] and [doc://com.apple.networkextension/documentation/NetworkExtension/NEOnDemandRule].

Instances of this class are thread safe.

## Controlling the VPN connection

- **startVPNTunnel()**: Start the process of connecting the VPN.
- **startVPNTunnel(options:)**: Start the process of connecting the VPN.
- **NEVPNConnectionStartOptionUsername**
- **NEVPNConnectionStartOptionPassword**
- **stopVPNTunnel()**: Start the process of disconnecting the VPN.

## Getting VPN connection status

- **manager**
- **status**: The current status of the VPN connection.
- **NEVPNStatus**: The possible states of a VPN connection.
- **connectedDate**: The date and time when the connection status changed to `NEVPNStatusConnected`.

## Notifications

- **NEVPNStatusDidChange**: Posted when the status of the VPN connection changes.

## Handling errors

- **fetchLastDisconnectError(completionHandler:)**: Retrives the most recent error that caused the VPN to disconnect.
- **NEVPNConnectionErrorDomain**: The domain for errors resulting from VPN connection calls.
- **NEVPNConnectionError**: Error codes specific to VPN connections.

## VPN control

- **NETunnelProviderSession**: An object to start and stop a tunnel connection and get its status.

## Inherits From

- NSObject

## Inherited By

- NETunnelProviderSession

## Conforms To

- CVarArg
- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable
- NSObjectProtocol
